sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d" table="x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1"> <x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <ars_id display_value="ARS 3.1">43903e93dbcd1010280df36f299619aa</ars_id> <assessment_methods_and_objects>Examine: Access control policy; system</assessment_methods_and_objects> <assessment_objective>Determine if the organization has implemented all elements of this control as described in the control statements and implementation standard(s).  Systems defined as CSPs:  Determine if the organization has implemented all elements of this control as </assessment_objective> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <assurance/> <baseline>High; Moderate; Low</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>The organization: a. Designates individuals authorized to post information onto a publicly accessible information system; b. Trains authorized individuals to ensure that publicly accessible information does not contain nonpublic information; c. Reviews the proposed content of information prior to posting onto the publicly accessible information system to ensure that nonpublic information is not included; and d. Reviews the content on the publicly accessible information system for nonpublic information bi-weekly and removes such information, if discovered.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Access Control">408779fcdb211010280df36f29961977</control_family> <control_name>Publicly Accessible Content</control_name> <control_number>AC-22</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>AC-22</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards>Systems defined as CSPs:  High, Moderate & Low:  CSP.1 - For CSPs, the organization reviews the content on the publicly accessible organizational information system for nonpublic information at le</implementation_standards> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>true</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>true</moderate> <number>ARSC0010854</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:22</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>1</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>Code: 5 U.S.C. ยง552(b)(6); FedRAMP Rev. 4 Baseline; OMB Memo: M-11-02; 45 C.F.R. ยง164.502(a)</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>AC-3, AC-4, AT-2, AT-3, AU-13</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>In accordance with federal laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, regulations, standards, and/or guidance, the public is not authorized access to nonpublic information (e.g., information protected under the Privacy Act and proprietary information). This control addresses information systems that are controlled by the organization and accessible to the public, typically without identification or authentication. The posting of information on non-CMS information systems is covered by organizational policy.  Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  A system of records maintaining personally identifiable information (PII) that is not approved for release under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) is nonpublic information. When agencies consider sharing or posting PII, they must do so in a way that fully protects individual privacy. Under HIPAA, a covered entity or business associate may not use or disclose protected health information except as provided by the HIPAA Privacy Rule. This control implements procedures to protect information, including PII, from being posted publicly improperly.PII that is nonpublic information must not be posted onto a publicly accessible information system.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:22</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>5087b9fcdb211010280df36f29961947</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:22</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
